Title: ‘Threat to democracy’: World reacts to killing of Trump ally Kirk
Summary: Charlie Kirk, a powerful voice in conservative politics at just 31 years old, was shot while speaking at a rally in Washington DC . Kirk was a Donald Trump ally .

Title: Wema Bank tops CBN capital requirement after N150b rights issue
Summary: Wema Bank has surpassed the Central Bank of Nigeria’s (CBN) minimum capital requirement for lenders with national licences . The lender successfully raised 150 billion naira ($97 million) through a rights issue .

Title: FCCPC receives 9,091 complaints in 6 months, recovers ₦10bn for consumers
Summary: Federal Competition and Consumer Protection Commission (FCCPC) received 8,255 complaints from aggrieved Nigerians . About N10 billion was also recovered .

Title: Measles Rubella: Kwara to vaccinate 1.8m pregnant women, children
Summary: Kwara State government has targeted the first week of October for the integrated Measles Rubella vaccination campaign of about 1.8 million pregnant women and children out of a total number of 1.2 billion people in the country .

Title: Minister says Nigerian women will return Tinubu to power in 2027
Summary: Honorable Minister of Women Affairs and Social Development, Hon. Imaan Sulaiman-Ibrahim, has said that Nigerian women will give President Bola Ahmed Tinubu a resounding victory come the 2027 general election . Speaking in Abeokuta, the Ogun State capital, on a visit to Abeokutu,

Title: Development of solid minerals imperative for economic growth – Abbas
Summary: The development of solid minerals is imperative for building a diversified, inclusive, and resilient economy . The Speaker of the House of Representatives, Rep. Abbas Tajudeen, says solid minerals are imperative for economic growth .

Title: An Insight Into the Canadian Gaming Market
Summary: Canada is fast becoming one of the biggest draws for entertainment investment in the world . Investors who are looking for global expansion understand that Canada still represents an untapped market . This is even more true when we look at online casinos and similar .

Title: Governor Idris suspends Kebbi health commissioner
Summary: Kebbi State Governor, Comrade Dr. Nasir Idris, has approved the suspension of the Commissioner for Health, Alhaji Yunusa Musa Ismail, with immediate effect .

Title: I make, sell pepper soup with stolen goats at my beer parlour – 56-yr-old suspect
Summary: Ayo Akinpelu, 56, told Amotekun operatives in Osun State that he sells goat pepper soup at his beer parlour with stolen goats . The suspect, who was arrested in Ipetu-Ijes,a said he make huge sales from the proceeds .

Title: Investigate rising cases of missing children – Benue Assembly urges Police, DSS
Summary: Benue State House of Assembly has urged the Commissioner of Police and the Director of State Services (DSS) to conduct an investigation into the rising cases of missing children .

Title: S'Sudan VP in court over death of 250 soldiers
Summary: South Sudan’s Vice-President Riek Machar has been charged with murder, treason and crimes against humanity over an attack on a military base that killed more than 250 soldiers . The government says Machar was responsible and has now charged him and 20 others . A fragile power-sharing agreement between President Salva Kiir and

Title: Otti wades into Abia farmers' group crisis, orders audit
Summary: Abia State Government has waded into the crisis rocking the state chapter of the All Farmers Association of Nigeria . The government also announced that the association’s activities and state of affairs would be audited, following allegations of misappropriation and lack of accountability .

Title: FG revokes 5% telecom tax on voice, data services
Summary: The Federal Government has scrapped the 5% excise duty tax previously imposed on telecommunications services, including voice calls and data usage . The National Orientation Agency made this known in a post via its official X (formerly Twitter) page on Thursday . President Bola Tinubu ordered the removal of the tax during discussions on the recently passed Finance Act

Title: Best Crypto to Buy: BlockDAG Powers Ahead With $405M Raised, 3M App Users, and a Global Miner Army
Summary: BlockDAG (BDAG) has grown beyond a simple project into a global force . Using a hybrid structure of DAG and Proof-of-Work, it has shifted from concept to delivery faster than many major Layer 1 chains . With 19,700 miners shipped, more than 3 million people mining on mobile, coverage across 130+

Title: 2027: Islamic scholars conduct prayers for Tinubu-Barau's success in Kano
Summary: A group under the aegis of Tinubu/Barau/Atah Movement organised a special prayer session in Kano on Thursday . The prayer session was attended by Ulamas and supporters of the All Progressives Congress from the 44 local government areas of the state . The clerics completed the recitation of the Holy Quran and
